concept.title: 1253.227-70 Conveyance of invention rights acquired by the Government.

conbody.p: The following form is prescribed as a means for contractors to report inventions made in the course of contract performance, as specified in 1227.305-4:
DD Form 882, Report of Inventions and Subcontracts. DD Form 882 can be found at http://www.aro.army.mil/forms/d882.pdf.
